channel.title: My server wont save.. please help me!
channel.description: my server wont save. the players have to log off so there acc's get saved. i have so many complaints that there losing lvl's and items. how can i add a auto-saver? plz help. thx

item.title: My server wont save.. please help me!
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Make the playerSave method loop more often.
